CustomField.description: Picklist field to choose whether the aid is untied, tied, or partially tied. This element specifies a default for all the activity's financial transactions; it can be overridden at the individual transaction level. If an activity is partially tied it is recommended that tied and untied commitments are reported as separate transactions and that transaction/tied-status is used to classify them.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Type of Classification; Whether the aid is untied, tied, or partially tied. This element specifies a default for all the activity's financial transactions; it can be overridden at the individual transaction level.
CustomField.label: IATI Tied Status
